General.Name: Asbestos Corporation Limited
General.Description: Asbestos Corporation Limited manages various mining assets in Canada. The company is involved in the rental of mining buildings that can be used as warehouses or plants; and sale of land, as well as royalties from the exploitation of a granite quarry. It also engages in the revegetation of mining sites. The company is headquartered in Thetford Mines, Canada. Asbestos Corporation Limited operates as a subsidiary of Mazarin Inc.
General.Address: 840 Ouellet Boulevard, Thetford Mines, QC, Canada, G6G 7A5
